message.raw:
Fixes #760. save_result and save_result_array now take optional arguments group
and overwrite, and save_result_array permits retention of existing attributes
when overwriting an existing dataset (via keep_attrs). I've also added a method
save_results_dict(self, results_dict, uncertainties=False) which writes a
dictionary of named results as attributes, with the option to pass a dictionary
of parameter = (value, u_value) tuples which we sometimes use when fitting.
If uncertainties = True, two attributes will get created for each fit parameter:
parameter_name and u_parameter_name.
